portfolio.title: First Portfolio
portfolio.description: After beginning my coding studies just one month prior, I decided that I needed to start my own project and get some practice in!

portfolio.title: JavaScript Number Game
portfolio.description: Go head to head with my AI and guess the right number

portfolio.title: Momentum App
portfolio.description: Based on Javascript. The first course i took challenged me to build my own browser app that can tell you current time, weather, randomised inspirational quotes and keep track of your own To Do List

portfolio.title: React Website
portfolio.description: Within two months, I had started to feel confident with my skills in HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript. So I began to pick-up the React framework and put together a project that would accelerate my learning
